text: The 1942 New York Giants season was the franchise's 60th season. The team finished in third place in the National League with an 85-67 record, 20 games behind the St. Louis Cardinals. == Offseason == * Prior to 1942 season: Al Sima was signed as an amateur free agent by the Giants.Al Sima page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === New York Giants Official Program April 14,1942 === Opening Day lineup === *Billy Werber 3b *Billy Jurges ss *Mel Ott rf *Johnny Mize 1b *Willard Marshall lf *Hank Leiber cf *Harry Danning c *Mickey Witek 2b *Carl Hubbell p === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
